title: curently logge dinto a match some how....
body: s\So I finished a match less that 20 minutes ago as jhin and when I went to start another it said I was still participating in an active game, this lead me to log out and reconnect, when I logged back in it asked me to reconnect to the match. currently it says I am unable to connect. any help?

replies.body: It sounds like you were caught in what we refer to as a "ghost game". This generally goes away fairly quickly, but can last up to a couple of hours under extreme circumstances. If you're still seeing this issue, let me know.
Restart your computer and login again.
